info.description:
Heather is a young woman living in the suburbs. One morning while getting the paper, she gets locked out of her house. Unfortunately for her, she was naked at the time! Now she must try to get back into her home, while also trying to find something to wear in the meantime. She can either do these things on her own or get help from others, people she knows or even people she doesn’t know, even if that means taking her further away from her home.

Rules:

No killing of any characters and no rape.

The main character has to be completely naked for the majority of the story. She can be given clothes or other things to cover up with at any time, but she can’t keep them for too long, at least not until the end of the story.
